task.title: Creating Your First Context-Sensitive Help Topic

step.cmd: Find the DITA map Exploring-ePublisher.ditamap in the ePublisher Express Document Manager.
Right click on the Exploring-ePublisher.ditamap and select Explore Location.
Open the DITA file t_create_your_fist_context_sensitive_help_topic.xml in your preferred editing tool.
In the DITA topic,“c_creating_your_first_context-sensitive-help-topic.xml” add a <prolog>/<metadata>/<othermeta> element under the <Title> "Creating Your First Context-Sensitive Help Topic,"
Set the name attribute of the <othermeta> element to TopicAlias.
Set the content attribute of the <othermeta> element to IDH_CreatingYourFirstContextSensitiveHelpTopic.
Generate output and verify through the Topics Report (Printable) that ePublisher created your TopicAlias marker.
Click on the Link “Output” to verify the path leads to the proper topic.
Return to the ePublisher Express Trial Guide to continue.
